title: Forever Evil 01 (2013) (Tablet Edition)
description:
I adjusted the resolution and compression of the original scan for easier reading on tablets and to save space. All credit goes to the original scanner for their hard work. I have added 'Tablet Edition' to the name to avoid confusion.

Enjoy and please seed back.


Forever Evil 1

By:   	Geoff Johns, David Finch	
Type:   	Comics
Genres:   	Superhero
Publisher:   	DC Comics	
Pub. Date:  	September 04, 2013
Availability:   	Pre-Order
UPC:  	76194131817200111

The first universe-wide event of The New 52 begins as FOREVER EVIL launches! The Justice League is DEAD!

And the villains shall INHERIT the Earth! An epic tle of the world's greatest super-villains starts here!
